title: Herbal Scented Incense (Meditation Blend)
excerpt: Natural incense made with sandalwood, vetiver, tulsi and natural gums to deepen meditation and calm the mind.
content:
## What Is This Meditation Incense?
A natural incense blend created from sandalwood, vetiver, tulsi, and plant-based gums. Crafted to support meditation, grounding, and calming of the mind.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Sandalwood cools Pitta and enhances focus; vetiver grounds Vata; tulsi uplifts and purifies the atmosphere.

### Key Benefits
- Enhances meditation and pranayama.
- Calms nervous system.
- Purifies and gently fragrances space.

## Ingredients
- Sandalwood powder
- Vetiver root powder
- Tulsi
- Natural binding gum resin

## Usage Instructions
- Light incense stick and allow aroma to fill meditation or relaxation space.

## Packaging
- Box with 20 sticks and instructions.

## Safety & Consultation
- Use in well-ventilated areas. Avoid if sensitive to smoke.

## Why Choose This Incense?
Clean-burning, natural aroma blend rooted in meditative Ayurvedic practice.
